headlines: We are more than just a network. We are a global team of problem-solvers, engineers, technologists and innovators.

museums-and-institutions.headline: And we’re rapidly growing.
museums-and-institutions.description: After acquiring AOL, last year Verizon went on to acquire Yahoo, FreeBee Data, XO Communications, Volicon, Complex Media, ExpressFleet, Fleetmatics, and formed a joint venture—Verizon Hearst Media Partners.

educational-database.headline: Verizon now owns 2,761 brands—helping us capitalize in the areas of video, cloud, automotive, mobile advertising & marketing, content creation & distribution, software, IoT, and security.

inquiries-graph.headline: Oh, did we mention we’re still ranked number one in our wireless and Fios networks?

caption.headline: Lorem Ipsum
caption.body: Ad et magna mollit elit adipisicing amet excepteur laboris consequat aliquip aute. Ut id elit voluptate ullamco laboris sit minim sunt. Et adipisicing laboris quis esse.

added-categories.headline: Or that we’re making ground groundbreaking strides in 5G technology? We’ll begin commercially deploying 5G service this year.

browse-and-collect-fairs.headline: Yes, we're a rising tech company and we're not stopping there
browse-and-collect-fairs.description: We're on a mission to monetize our network and become a unique technology leader, while improving lives and growing shareholder value.

bringing-together.headline: In this new ecosystem of ever-evolving needs for complex machine-to-machine and IoT solutions, Verizon is moving quickly to stay ahead of increasing demands.

conclusion.message: “Verizon is in absolute unique position in this new ecosystem. It is about connecting anything to anything.”

links.name: Ajay Waghray, CIO, Verizon Enterprise Solutions
